name: tweed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a thick material made from wool of several different colours: a tweed jacket a tweed skirt and sensible shoes
Trish Punch/Lonely Planet Images/GettyImages tweeds [ plural ]
clothes made from tweed, especially a jacket and matching trousers/skirt: He wore tweeds and smoked a pipe.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a thick, rough material woven from wool and used in clothing, esp. suits and coats: a gray tweed jacket
